promotion.title: MOISTEN HERE AND JOIN SALEM'S MOST PREFERRED CLUB!
promotion.description: GET EXCLUSIVE OFFERS FOR MEMBERS ONLY. All you have to do is fill out the information card below, sign it, and mail it back. Don't miss this opportunity to join Salem's Most Preferred Club. It's our way of thanking you for choosing Salem. And the only way to get these exclusive Membership benefits.

offer.details: YES, I WANT TO JOIN SALEM'S MOST PREFERRED CLUB
offer.restrictions: OFFER RESTRICTED TO SMOKERS 21 YEARS OF AGE OR OLDER

promotion.instructions: Complete and sign this original Information card. No postage necessary. Just moisten, seal, and mail. If you're currently receiving Salem mailings, please fill this out to ensure you don't miss a single offer.

recipient.name: Mary Rita Kelly
recipient.address: 215 Edgemoor Road Apt. F, Bridgeport, CT 06606

warning: SURGEON GENERAL'S WARNING: Smoking Causes Lung Cancer, Heart Disease, Emphysema, And May Complicate Pregnancy.
